content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "browse_website" command to visit the National Geographic website and found articles and videos on the environment, including Japan's plan to release nuclear wastewater into the Pacific. I then used the "google" command to search for more information on this topic. Most recently, I received a message from the AI that I used the "browse_website" command to visit the New York Times website, where I learned that Japan plans to release over 1.3 million tons of treated but still slightly radioactive water from the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant into the Pacific starting in spring 2023. This has sparked outrage among Japan's neighbors.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "potential environmental impact of Japan\'s plan to release nuclear wastewater into the Pacific"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.nationalgeographic.com/premium/article/fukushima-japan-nuclear-wastewater-pacific-ocean", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9659344/", "https://www.npr.org/2021/04/13/986695494/japan-to-dump-wastewater-from-wrecked-fukushima-nuclear-plant-into-pacific-ocean", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2666683921000183", "https://digitalcommons.wcl.american.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=2110&context=auilr", "https://www.facebook.com/mofatrmi/posts/for-immediate-release-8-may-2021majuro-republic-of-the-marshall-islands-rmi-conv/294908318948942/", "https://www.ohchr.org/en/press-releases/2021/04/japan-un-experts-say-deeply-disappointed-decision-discharge-fukushima-water", "https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2022/2/14/not-a-dumping-ground-pacific-condemns-fukushima-water-plan"]', type='action_result')]
"""
